descriptionHtml:
Crystal Eyes
============

Author: EttienneV (Xelus)
version: 1.0

Description
===========

This mod replaces the standard eyes of all the races that use the \"humanlike\" eyes with something better, cleaner eyes and clearer.

NOTE:This mod was compressed using 7zip version 9.20, if you experience \"corrupted\" archives when trying to extract, please download the latest 7zip. Thank you

Installation
============

Copy the \"textures\" folder to your \"skyrim\\data\" directory and replace if asked.

Credits
=======

Bethesda - Creating such an amazing game.
author: EttienneV Xelus
